Headline: Opinion: Marjorie Taylor Greene's 'apology' only shows how dangerous she really is - CNN
Text: Opinion by Jill Filipovic Updated 6:06 PM ET, Tue June 15, 2021 Jill Filipovic is a journalist based in New York and author of the book "OK Boomer, Let's Talk: How My Generation Got Left Behind." Follow her on Twitter. The opinions expressed in this commentary are solely her own. View more opinion articles on CNN. (CNN)You know there's something deeply wrong with American conservatism when a Republican member of Congress has to go to the US Holocaust Memorial Museum and hold a news conference to admit it's "offensive" to compare Capitol Hill mask-wearing rules to the Holocaust.
